p: Multimeric-001 (M-001) is a vaccine currently being developed by BiondVax Pharmaceuticals consisting of nine conserved B and T cell epitopes from HA, nucleoprotein (NP) and matrix 1 (M1) protein arranged in triplicate and put onto a single recombinant protein [ 57] . Phase I/II clinical studies have shown the M-001 vaccine induced both cellular and humoral immunity to influenza A and B strains as a standalone vaccine [ 58], and also enhanced seroconversion when used as a primer for elderly patients before inoculation with inactivated trivalent vaccines [ 85].
